title: Ping Spikes During Normal 5v5 and Aram
body: Hey i just wanted to say i have been having lagg spikes for two weeks now. Everytime i get into a game my ping seems to spike every few minutes. I rebooted my internet and even called the internet provider. i dont have this issue on any other game. I was wondering if anyone else has this issue and if they have fixed it. Thanks!

replies.body: Trust me, over half of the players have this same issue. You have it easy it seems like. They won't fix any of their coding or servers. They are going to link this page https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Latency spikes are generally caused by two potential problems: troublesome local network settings or poor ISP network routing to the server. There are quite a lot of steps that could be taken to resolve this, but we've consolidated the most common solutions in our [Network Connection Guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you noticed any change after working through the steps in that guide!
